original_text: Such were the exploits of Benaiah son of Jehoiada; he too was as famous as the three mighty warriors.
korean_text: 여호야다의 아들 브나야가 이런 일을 행하였으므로 세 용사 중에 이름을 얻고

sentences.original_text: Such were the exploits of Benaiah
he too was as famous as the three mighty warriors
sentences.korean_translation: 그 역시 세 명의 용사들만큼 유명했습니다
